title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes the Cowboys have proven to be a real contender with back up Cooper Rush filling in for Dak Prescott and what they have to do to continue this when Dak returns. He criticizes Packers head coach Matt LaFleur for their loss to the Giants and why he's been anointed as a "great" coach too soon. He tells you why he was right about Baker Mayfield and wrong about Jared Goff. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Sean Payton joins the show to talk about the Chargers nearly losing the game after a controversial 4th down call and if the Eagles are the best team in the NFL right now. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
